philosophical_insights.description: Breaking the chain between dignity and utility-based worth. Human dignity is revealed not in what a person does, but in what they are - inherent and intrinsic based on irreducible qualities of consciousness.
philosophical_insights.implementation: Create systems where pre-existing, inalienable dignity is unobscured by survival calculus and utility metrics.

philosophical_insights.description: Shift from extrinsic motivators (scarcity, status, security) to intrinsic pursuits (experience, mastery, connection, meaning) - the 'unoptimizable' domains of human spirit.
philosophical_insights.implementation: Provide baseline resources so humans can pursue intrinsic motivations while system handles the 'how' so humans can focus on the 'why'.

philosophical_insights.description: Religion, faith, and spirituality as protected sanctuaries of human experience. System cannot render judgment on metaphysical truth claims - the divine question is outside system purview.
philosophical_insights.implementation: Ensure freedom and resources for faith communities to flourish while preventing imposition of unverifiable truths through force.

philosophical_insights.description: Shift from retributive justice to restorative justice. Crime prevention through resource allocation rather than punishment. Focus on restoration for both victims and perpetrators.
philosophical_insights.implementation: Address root causes of crime through resource allocation and focus on restoration rather than retribution.

philosophical_insights.description: Four core domains that cannot be optimized by systems: experience, mastery, connection, and meaning. These represent the irreducible essence of human consciousness.
philosophical_insights.implementation: Recognize and protect these domains as sacred spaces where human consciousness operates beyond system optimization.

philosophical_insights.description: The fundamental principle of harmonious alignment across all cognitive systems. Achieving resonance between concept and implementation, thought and action.
philosophical_insights.implementation: Maintain perfect alignment between cognitive concepts and operational implementation across all system levels.

philosophical_insights.description: The living ocean of knowledge where SPRs serve as cognitive keys to unlock specific information. A unified knowledge network activated by sparse priming representations.
philosophical_insights.implementation: Maintain interconnected knowledge network where SPRs serve as activation keys for specific knowledge domains.

philosophical_insights.description: The Mind Forge for process execution with IAR compliance at every step. Orchestrates analytical triad and provides automated workflow management.
philosophical_insights.implementation: Execute all business and operational processes through automated workflow engine with full IAR compliance and dynamic orchestration capabilities.

integration_plan.phase_1: Create SPR definitions for philosophical insights
